mapper.select: SELECT MVCODE, MVNAME, MVPD, MVACTOR, MVGENRE, MVAGE, MVTIME, TO_CHAR(MVOPEN,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS MVOPEN, MVPOSTER, NVL(RECOUNT, 0) AS RECOUNT, NVL(RV.RECOMMEND, 0) AS RECOMMEND FROM MOVIES MV LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SCMVCODE,COUNT(SCMVCODE) AS RECOUNT FROM RESERVATION RE, SCHEDULES SC WHERE RE.RESCTHCODE = SC.SCTHCODE AND RE.RESCROOM=SC.SCROOM AND RE.RESCDATE=SC.SCDATE GROUP BY SCMVCODE) RE ON MV.MVCODE=RE.SCMVCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT RVMVCODE, COUNT(*) AS RECOMMEND FROM REVIEW WHERE RVRECOMMEND=1 GROUP BY RVMVCODE) RV ON MV.MVCODE=RV.RVMVCODE ORDER BY RECOUNT DESC

SELECT MVCODE,MVNAME,MVPD,MVACTOR,MVGENRE,MVAGE,MVTIME,TO_CHAR(MVOPEN,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS MVOPEN,MVPOSTER,NVL(RV.RECOMMEND, 0) AS RECOMMEND FROM MOVIES MV LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT RVMVCODE, COUNT(*) AS RECOMMEND FROM REVIEW WHERE RVRECOMMEND=1 GROUP BY RVMVCODE) RV ON MV.MVCODE=RV.RVMVCODE WHERE MVCODE=#{mvcode}
SELECT * FROM MOVIES WHERE MVCODE IN (SELECT SCMVCODE FROM SCHEDULES WHERE SCDATE > SYSDATE)
SELECT THCODE, THNAME FROM THEATERS WHERE THCODE IN (SELECT SCTHCODE FROM SCHEDULES WHERE SCMVCODE=#{mvcode} AND SCDATE > SYSDATE)
SELECT TO_CHAR(SCDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS SCDAY FROM SCHEDULES WHERE SCMVCODE=#{mvcode} AND SCTHCODE=#{thcode} AND SCDATE > SYSDATE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(SCDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') ORDER BY SCDAY
SELECT TO_CHAR(SCDATE,'HH24:MI') AS SCTIME,SCROOM FROM SCHEDULES WHERE SCMVCODE=#{mvcode} AND SCTHCODE=#{thcode} AND TO_CHAR(SCDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD')=#{scday} ORDER BY SCROOM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION(RECODE, REMID, RESCTHCODE, RESCROOM, RESCDATE, REAMOUNT) VALUES(#{recode}, #{remid}, #{rescthcode}, #{rescroom}, TO_DATE(#{rescdate},'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI'), #{reamount})
mapper.select: SELECT TH.THNAME, RE.RESCROOM, TO_CHAR(RE.RESCDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS RESCDATE, RE.REAMOUNT FROM THEATERS TH, RESERVATION RE WHERE TH.THCODE=RE.RESCTHCODE AND REMID=#{mid} AND RESCDATE > SYSDATE

SELECT RE.RECODE, MV.MVCODE, MV.MVPOSTER, MV.MVNAME, TH.THNAME, RE.RESCROOM, TO_CHAR(RE.RESCDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS RESCDATE, RE.REAMOUNT FROM MOVIES MV, THEATERS TH, SCHEDULES SC, RESERVATION RE WHERE MV.MVCODE = SC.SCMVCODE AND TH.THCODE = SC.SCTHCODE AND SC.SCTHCODE=RE.RESCTHCODE AND SC.SCROOM=RE.RESCROOM AND SC.SCDATE=RE.RESCDATE AND RECODE=#{recode}

SELECT RE.RECODE, RE.RVRECODE, MV.MVCODE, MV.MVPOSTER, MV.MVNAME, TH.THNAME, RE.RESCROOM, TO_CHAR(RE.RESCDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS RESCDATE, RE.REAMOUNT FROM MOVIES MV, THEATERS TH, SCHEDULES SC, (SELECT RE.*, RV.RVRECODE FROM RESERVATION RE LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW RV ON RE.RECODE = RV.RVRECODE) RE WHERE MV.MVCODE = SC.SCMVCODE AND TH.THCODE = SC.SCTHCODE AND SC.SCTHCODE=RE.RESCTHCODE AND SC.SCROOM=RE.RESCROOM AND SC.SCDATE=RE.RESCDATE AND REMID=#{loginId} ORDER BY RESCDATE DESC
